Nov 3 (Reuters) - Airtel Africa PLC AAF.L:

  • AIRTEL AFRICA PLC - FIRST CLOSING OF TOWER SALE IN MADAGASCAR

  • AIRTEL AFRICA PLC - FIRST CLOSING OF TOWER SALE IN MADAGASCAR

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - GROSS CONSIDERATION FOR TRANSACTION WILL BE $51.7M

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - PROCEEDS FROM TRANSACTION WILL BE USED TO REDUCE GROUP EXTERNAL DEBT AND TO INVEST IN NETWORK AND SALES INFRASTRUCTURE IN MADAGASCAR.
